extension.name: FavPromote4col
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description:
FavPromote is a free responsive Joomla! module that lets you upload any image and assign it a short description and a title with a Font Awesome icon.
It works exactly in the same way as the pure FavPromote, however it is fixed in 4 cols or less. It means, if only one column is present it will occupy 3 empty spaces (12/4columns). For more info, please see the demo and documentation for the FavPromote module.



Copyright © 2012-2017 FavThemes.

field.name: jquery_load
field.label: Load Joomla! jQuery
field.description: This setting loads Joomla!'s jQuery library. Choose NO if your website loads jQuery from an external source.

field.name: layout_effect
field.label: Layout Effect
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the layout on page scroll and load. Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers.

field.name: title_google_font
field.label: Title Google Font
field.description: Insert the name of the Google Font for the title of the module, for example Open Sans or Roboto. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_font_weight
field.label: Title Font Weight
field.description: Set the font weight for the title of the module.

field.name: title_font_style
field.label: Title Font Style
field.description: Set the font style for the title of the module.

field.name: title_padding
field.label: Title Padding
field.description: Insert the padding for the title of the module using pixels or percent (for example: 14px or 10%, not 14). The padding is a CSS property that sets the space around the content. The padding can have from 1 to 4 values (top, right, bottom and left). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_font_size
field.label: Title Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the title of the module using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_line_height
field.label: Title Line Height
field.description: Insert the line height for the title of the module using pixels or em (for example: 14px or 1.2em, not 14). The line-height property is used to modify the spacing between the lines of text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_text_align
field.label: Title Text Align
field.description: Choose the text align for the title of the module.

field.name: title_icon_font_size
field.label: Title Icon Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the icon of the title using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_icon_vertical_align
field.label: Title Icon Vertical Align
field.description: Choose the vertical alignment for the icon of the title of the module.

field.name: description_text_font_size
field.label: Description Font Size
field.description: Insert the font size for the description text using pixels, percent or em (for example: 14px, 120% or 1.2em, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text_line_height
field.label: Description Line Height
field.description: Insert the line height for the description text using pixels or em (for example: 14px or 1.2em, not 14). The line-height property is used to modify the spacing between the lines of text. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text_align
field.label: Description Text Align
field.description: Choose the text align for the description of the module.

field.name: order1
field.label: Order 1
field.description: Type the order you want to present it

field.name: show_column1
field.label: Show Column 1
field.description: Choose if the column for this module should be displayed or not.

field.name: column_border_color1
field.label: Column 1 Border Color
field.description: Choose the color for the border of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: column_border_radius1
field.label: Column 1 Border Radius
field.description: Insert the border-radius for the border of the module column using pixels or percent (for example: 140px or 80%, not 140). Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: upload_image1
field.label: Upload Image 1
field.description: Upload the image for the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: image_link1
field.label: Image 1 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the module column image. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field means that no link is assigned to the image.

field.name: image_target1
field.label: Image 1 Link Target
field.description: Choose the link target of the URL for the module column image.

field.name: image_alt1
field.label: Image 1 Alt Text
field.description: Insert the text for the image Alt. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_text1
field.label: Title 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the title of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_color1
field.label: Title 1 Color
field.description: Choose the color for the title of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_bg_color1
field.label: Title 1 Background Color
field.description: Choose the color for the background of the title of the module column. This is also the color for the module background on hover. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_link1
field.label: Title 1 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the title for the module column. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field means that no link is assigned to the title.

field.name: title_link_target1
field.label: Title 1 Link Target
field.description: Choose the link target of the URL for the title for this module column.

field.name: title_icon1
field.label: Title 1 Icon
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name (for example: fa-magic or fa-joomla). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text1
field.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor.
field.label: Description 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the description of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: widget_text1
field.label: Widget 1 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the description of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text_color1
field.label: Description 1 Text Color
field.description: Choose the color for the description of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.description: Select the link target of the URL for the module column image

field.name: image_alt18
field.label: Image 18 Alt Text
field.description: Insert the text for the image Alt. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_text18
field.label: Title 18 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the title of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_color18
field.label: Title 18 Color
field.description: Choose the color for the title of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_bg_color18
field.label: Title 18 Background Color
field.description: Choose the color for the background of the title of the module. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: title_link18
field.label: Title 18 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the title for the module column. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field means that no link is assigned to the title.

field.name: title_link_target18
field.label: Title 18 Link Target
field.description: Choose the link target of the URL for the title for this module column.

field.name: title_icon18
field.label: Title 18 Icon
field.description: Insert the Font Awesome icon name (for example: fa-magic or fa-joomla). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text18
field.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor.
field.label: Description 18 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the description of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: widget_text18
field.label: Widget 18 Text
field.description: Insert the text for the description of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: description_text_color18
field.label: Description 18 Text Color
field.description: Choose the color for the description of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: order19
field.label: Order 19
field.description: Type the order you want to present it

field.name: show_column19
field.label: Show Column 19
field.description: Choose if the column for this module should be displayed or not.

field.name: column_border_color19
field.label: Column 19 Border Color
field.description: Choose the color for the border of the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: column_border_radius19
field.label: Column 19 Border Radius
field.description: Insert the border-radius for the border of the module column using pixels or percent (for example: 140px or 80%, not 140). Note that the CSS3 features are not supported by older browsers. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: upload_image19
field.label: Upload Image 19
field.description: Upload the image for the module column. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: image_link19
field.label: Image 19 Link
field.description: Insert the URL for the module column image. Note that the link must include http:// or https://. A blank field means that no link is assigned to the image.
